propertyDescriptor.name: BillingContactEmail
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the email address that will appear in the invoice footer.

propertyDescriptor.name: BillingAddress
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the address that will appear in the invoice header.

propertyDescriptor.name: CreditToAccount
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the Credit account information that will appear in the invoice header.

propertyDescriptor.name: JETCSVSetting
propertyDescriptor.description: Comma separated values for 'Department,Fund,Program,Project,Account' for the total/last row in JET CSV.
propertyDescriptor.defaultValue: Set Department,Set Fund,Set Program,Set Project,Set Account
